title: Kathy Smith's winning workout
brief_description: Kathy Smith presents a new method to achieve your body’s best shape with her goal orientated easy 12 week plan. This complete intermediate fitness program features weight training, aerobics and stretching. Close-ups help prevent injury by detailing movements to show correct form and technique.
